content:
Kylee Alons a freshman from Fort Collins Coloroado swims in the 200yard butterfly against Virginiaat Casey Aquatic Center on Saturday Jan PERIOD   PERIOD with a final time of . pERIOD NC State Womens Swimming  Diving was victorious over the Cavaliers with a final score of  PERIOD

For the second time in the last three seasons the NC State womens swimming and diving team captured the ACC title at the Greensboro Aquatic Center PERIOD The Wolfpack finished the conference meet Saturday with  team points  ahead of secondplace Virginia PERIOD

After winning three events over the first two days of ACCs the Wolfpack exploded over the final two days of competition PERIOD NC State finished with  gold medals and  total podium finishes to take back the ACC crown PERIOD

In the pool the Pack women took the top spot on the podium in  of  swimming events to go along with gold in one of three diving events PERIOD NC State swept the podium in two events the 400yard individual medley and the 1650yard freestyle PERIOD

The highlight of the entire meet for NC State came Friday in the  IM as the Wolfpack swept the topfour spots in the event PERIOD Sophomore Kate Moore won gold with a time of . for the first individual ACC title of her career PERIOD Junior Makayla Sargent freshman Emma Muzzy and sophomore Julia Poole rounded out the Packs dominance in the  IM PERIOD

The  IM was just one of five gold medals captured by the Wolfpack on Friday alone PERIOD In the 100yard breaststroke freshman Sophie Hansson set a new ACC record with a swim of . on the way to her first individual title PERIOD

Senior Elise Haan won the 100yard backstroke for the second season in a row finishing in . to place on the top of the podium PERIOD Muzzy joined Haan in the final of the  back placing seventh PERIOD

NC State also captured its third relay title of the meet Friday as Haan Hansson freshman Kylee Alons and Poole swam a . in the 400yard medley relay to keep the Wolfpacks dominance going PERIOD

On the diving boards junior Madeline Kline claimed the ACC title on the platform for the second year in a row PERIOD Kline scored . in the platform final Friday beating the rest of the field by almost  points PERIOD Out of the seven event finals that took place Friday night the Wolfpack won five PERIOD

The Wolfpack started the final night of competition out in style Saturday sweeping the podium in the  free PERIOD Sophomore Tamila Holub barely outtouched senior teammate Anna Jahns by . seconds for the gold medal PERIOD Sargent rounded out the Packs podium sweep finishing a little less than  seconds behind Jahns PERIOD

The winning rolled on for NC State as Muzzy captured her first individual ACC title in the 200yard backstroke PERIOD Muzzy battled Virginias Megan Moroney coming from behind with a blazingfast final leg to outtouch Moroney by . seconds PERIOD Moore and Haan joined Muzzy in the final finishing fifth and sixth respectively PERIOD

After sophomore KyLee Perry earned a bronze medal in the 100yard freestyle Hansson won her second individual gold medal of the meet PERIOD Hansson finished the 200yard breaststroke in . over two seconds faster than the rest of the field to sweep the breaststroke events at ACCs PERIOD

The Wolfpack women finished up ACCs with one final podium finish placing second in the 400yard freestyle relay PERIOD The team of Perry Alons Hansson and Haan touched in just over one second behind Louisville PERIOD

Kline competed in her second event final of the meet Saturday night placing eighth on the 3meter board with a score of . pERIOD

After having Friday off the mens divers also returned to competition Saturday night on the platform PERIOD Wolfpack junior James Brady finished on the podium in third place with a score of . pERIOD

The mens swimming team takes center stage next as it will be in Greensboro next week for the mens ACC Championships PERIOD
